text: Kuma kanã ganin rãnã idan ta fito tanã karkata daga kõgonsu wajen dãma kuma idan ta fãɗi tanã gurgura su wajen hagu, kuma su, sunã a cikin wani fili daga gare shi. Wannan abu yanã daga ãyõyin Allah. Wanda Allah Ya shiryar, to shĩ ne mai shiryuwa, kuma wanda Allah Ya ɓatar to bã zã ka sãmar masa wani majiɓinci mai shiryarwa ba
